taskbody.context: The following steps describe the installation procedure of , valid for Linux:

step.cmd: Download the oxygen-32bit.sh oxygenAuthor-32bit.sh oxygenDeveloper-32bit.sh oxygenXMLDiff-32bit.sh syncroSVNClient-32bit.sh installation kit for 32 bit Linux machines or the oxygen-64bit.sh oxygenAuthor-64bit.sh oxygenDeveloper-64bit.sh oxygenXMLDiff-64bit.sh syncroSVNClient-64bit.sh installation kit for 64 bit Linux machines and run it.
Follow the instructions presented in the installation program.

note.p: To specify a different Java Virtual Machine for to use, set the home folder of the desired Java Virtual Machine in the JAVA_HOME or JDK_HOME environment variables. If JAVA_HOME and JDK_HOME are not set, the launcher looks for a Java Virtual Machine installed in a standard location on your computer and uses it to run the application.
